english.segment1: Smile, wave. Convince the sanctuary, our charade. Though you're the object of my deepest rage. Just counterfeit this holiness for me. And everything will be OK
english.segment2: My sweet one. You tell no lies. The greatest reason to be despised
english.segment3: But we must pretend. Your broken wrist. Just happened when you fell off your bike
english.segment4: So this is. The reason. The sanctuary hums. God save us. God save us. From your chosen ones
english.segment5: Smile, wave. Protect his pulpit from all suffering. He'll make celebrity the end game. So much more valuable than family. Not even violence can betray..
english.segment6: As long as. You keep your lips. Locked up til the end of this age
english.segment7: And even. If you won't. It's your word up against what he'll say
english.segment8: Cry, Girl. Become the wails of victims unheard. Your tears have given you the calm nerve. So if they're asking you to hide your bane. You just keep screaming to the grave
english.segment9: You'll be. The reason. The helpless celebrate. He takes us. He takes us. From our violent shame
